articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: FDA adds warning on rare heart inflammation to Pfizer, Moderna jabs - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: US regulator revises fact sheets for health care providers to include warning
articles.content: The U.S. drug regulator on Friday added a warning to the literature that accompanies Pfizer Inc /BioNTech and Moderna COVID vaccine shots to indicate the rare risk of heart inflammation after its use… [+1226 chars]

articles.title: Makansutra founder KF Seetoh slams NEA for increasing hawker stalls rent by 40% amid challenging times - The Online Citizen Asia
articles.description: The Online Citizen Asia Makansutra founder KF Seetoh slams NEA for increasing hawker stalls rent by 40% amid challenging times
articles.content: Makansutra founder KF Seetoh took to Facebook on Friday (25 June) to slam the National Environment Agency (NEA) for raising the rent of hawker stalls by 40 percent amid challenging times due to the o… [+2057 chars]

articles.title: Contestant cyberbullied by netizens over 'unfair judging' on Fann Wong and Jeanette Aw's show Creme de la Creme - AsiaOne
articles.description: The clock is ticking as four contestants hunch over their workstations trying to recreate a strawberry tart dessert by professional pastry chef Janice Wong. This is the semi-finals and only three can advance to the next round for a chance to win the Mediacorp…

articles.author: Bernama
articles.title: Japan to donate 1 million AstraZeneca shots to Asian nations - New Straits Times
articles.description: ANKARA: Japan on Friday announced it will provide Oxford-AstraZeneca’s Covid-19 vaccines to Asian nations starting next week, according to Anadolu.
